channel.title: Master Academic English Fast with Lisa Trujillo
channel.description: Master Academic English Fast with Lisa Trujillo

item.title: Studying in the United States? Need to Master the English Language?
item.description:
Studying in the United States? Need to Master the English Language?

This site is for you if you need to master academic English quickly in order to finish college or university faster and save tuition money that you would otherwise have to spend on pre-college level ( non-transferable credit) classes or repeating classes because your English proficiency was not satisfactory enough to do well.
